title: Manage Operator Run Bidding
description: A new set of driver work assignments (runs) is available. Drivers must be allowed to bid on them in order of seniority.

tasks.description: A planner finalizes a new run cut and opens it for bidding.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new runs are available for drivers to view.

tasks.description: The system notifies the most senior driver that it is their turn to bid.
The driver logs in and selects their preferred run from the list of available runs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver's choice is recorded, and that run is removed from the available list.

tasks.description: The system then notifies the next most senior driver that it is their turn, repeating the process until all runs are assigned.
tasks.expected_outcome: The entire bidding process is managed systematically by seniority.
